oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: =kasin (Klaas Katkop) (IV)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Koranna-Hottentot Words, with their Bushman and English translations from #kasin. (B XXV. 2365-2373, 2375-2413). List of Namaqua, Koranna and |xam words by =kasin (Klaas Katkop), including body parts, relations and other information of daily life. 1) Namaqua vocabulary appears on many of the verso pages of this story, 2) p.2372v: '4487. Hans Pampier. Old Koranna at Breakwater who knows many stories.', 3) This story is found in Book XXV.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Wilhelm Bleek notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Words and sentences: Koranna-|xam vocabulary
